item.title: My thoughts on Secure Code Review
item.description: This article is going to cover my journey in cyber security, thoughts on secure code review and how to improve your own skills. I have now worked for four years professionally in the cyber security field as consultant, mostly doing white-box assessments with access to source code. Since I have a developer background, I always approach a project with source code in mind, because to me, source is absolute truth. And from a customer perspective, it’s way more worth the money for me to be able to view the source in order to find deeper issues.
